materials.raw_text: B6: 30 g, Co: 5 g, Mo: 150 g, Nb: 30 g, Ni: 5 g

sourcing.instructions: B (Boron): Chemical supply stores; Co (Cobalt): Metal suppliers; Mo (Molybdenum): Metal suppliers; Nb (Niobium): Metal suppliers; Ni (Nickel): Metal suppliers
steps: B (Boron): Chemical supply stores; Co (Cobalt): Metal suppliers; Mo (Molybdenum): Metal suppliers; Nb (Niobium): Metal suppliers; Ni (Nickel): Metal suppliers
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 8-12 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 4 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down to room temperature naturally (approximately 8-12 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
